145 inline SqliteConnection::SqliteConnection(sqlite3* connection, ConnectionType connectionType)
146 : m_connection(connection), m_connectionType(connectionType)
147 {}
148 
149 inline SqliteConnection::~SqliteConnection()
150 {
151  reset();
152 }
153 
154 inline void SqliteConnection::reset(sqlite3* connection, ConnectionType connectionType)
155 {
156  // close connection only if it is internal
157  if (m_connectionType == INTERNAL_CONNECTION)
158  sqlite3_close_v2(m_connection); // sqlite3_close_v2(NULL) is a harmless no-op
159 
160  m_connection = connection;
161  m_connectionType = connectionType;
162 }
163 
164 inline SqliteConnection::ConnectionType SqliteConnection::getConnectionType() const
165 {
166  return m_connectionType;
167 }
168 
169 inline sqlite3* SqliteConnection::getConnection()
170 {
171  return m_connection;
172 }
173 
174 template <typename ALLOC>
175 inline void SqliteConnection::executeUpdate(const zserio::string<ALLOC>& sqlQuery)
176 {
177  executeUpdate(sqlQuery.c_str());
178 }
179 
180 inline void SqliteConnection::executeUpdate(const char* sqlQuery)
181 {
182  const int result = sqlite3_exec(m_connection, sqlQuery, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
183  if (result != SQLITE_OK)
184  {
185  throw SqliteException("SqliteConnection::executeUpdate(): sqlite3_exec failed: ") +
186  SqliteErrorCode(result);
187  }
188 }
189 
190 template <typename ALLOC>
191 inline sqlite3_stmt* SqliteConnection::prepareStatement(const zserio::string<ALLOC>& sqlQuery)
192 {
193  return prepareStatement(sqlQuery.c_str());
194 }
195 
196 inline sqlite3_stmt* SqliteConnection::prepareStatement(const char* sqlQuery)
197 {
198  sqlite3_stmt* statement = nullptr;
199  const int result = sqlite3_prepare_v2(m_connection, sqlQuery, -1, &statement, nullptr);
200  if (result != SQLITE_OK)
201  {
202  throw SqliteException("SqliteConnection::prepareStatement(): sqlite3_prepare_v2() failed: ") +
203  SqliteErrorCode(result);
204  }
205 
206  return statement;
207 }
208 
209 inline bool SqliteConnection::startTransaction()
210 {
211  bool wasTransactionStarted = false;
212  if (sqlite3_get_autocommit(m_connection))
213  {
214  executeUpdate("BEGIN;");
215  wasTransactionStarted = true;
216  }
217 
218  return wasTransactionStarted;
219 }
220 
221 inline void SqliteConnection::endTransaction(bool wasTransactionStarted)
222 {
223  if (wasTransactionStarted)
224  executeUpdate("COMMIT;");
225 }
